headline.main: Sarajevo Gunman Commits Suicide After Killing Two Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Sarajevo Gunman Commits Suicide After Killing Two Soldiers

docs.snippet: A gunman who shot and killed two Bosnian soldiers and wounded another committed suicide on Wednesday after police surrounded his house on the outskirts of Sarajevo, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A gunman who shot and killed two Bosnian soldiers and wounded another committed suicide on Wednesday after police surrounded his house on the outskirts of Sarajevo, authorities said.

headline.main: White House Says Obama Would Veto Proposal for More Scrutiny of Refugees
headline.print_headline: White House Says Obama Would Veto Proposal for More Scrutiny of Refugees

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama would veto a proposal from Republican lawmakers in the U.S. House of Representatives for additional scrutiny of refugees from Syria or Iraq, the White House said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama would veto a proposal from Republican lawmakers in the U.S. House of Representatives for additional scrutiny of refugees from Syria or Iraq, the White House said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Roanoke Mayor Asks to Suspend Relocating of Syrian Refugees

headline.main: Adviser Who Questioned Ben Carson’s Grasp of Mideast Is Consulted for Op-Ed Piece
headline.print_headline: Ex-C.I.A. Officer Gave Views For Writing of Carson Op-Ed

docs.snippet: A foreign policy adviser whom Ben Carson publicly distanced himself from after the adviser criticized Mr. Carson’s grasp of the Middle East provided input for an opinion column Mr. Carson published online in The Washington Post about defeating t...
docs.abstract: A foreign policy adviser whom Ben Carson publicly distanced himself from after the adviser criticized Mr. Carson’s grasp of the Middle East provided input for an opinion column Mr. Carson published online in The Washington Post about defeating the Islamic State.

headline.main: Obama Vows to Veto Bill Increasing Screening for Refugees
headline.print_headline: Obama Vows to Veto Bill Increasing Screening for Refugees

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama is vowing to veto a bill from House Republicans that would increase screening for Syrian and Iraqi refugees before they enter the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is vowing to veto a bill from House Republicans that would increase screening for Syrian and Iraqi refugees before they enter the United States.

headline.main: New York Prosecutor Seeks U.S. Law to Weaken Smartphone Encryption
headline.print_headline: New York Prosecutor Seeks U.S. Law to Weaken Smartphone Encryption

docs.snippet: Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr. on Wednesday called for federal legislation requiring tech companies such as Google and Apple to design smartphone operating systems so law enforcement can unlock data stored on them....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manhattan District Attorney Cyrus Vance Jr. on Wednesday called for federal legislation requiring tech companies such as Google and Apple to design smartphone operating systems so law enforcement can unlock data stored on them.

headline.main: Brussels District Rallies Against Home-Grown Jihadists
headline.print_headline: Brussels District Rallies Against Home-Grown Jihadists

docs.snippet: Molenbeek, the Brussels district that was home to leaders of Friday's Islamist attacks in Paris, staged a candlelit vigil on Wednesday to honor the victims and show the world their borough offers more than violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: Molenbeek, the Brussels district that was home to leaders of Friday's Islamist attacks in Paris, staged a candlelit vigil on Wednesday to honor the victims and show the world their borough offers more than violence.
